title: How I Beat the Odds to Lose 100lbs.
itunes:title: How I Beat the Odds to Lose 100lbs
description:
Get the Free Course here:
https://phit.click/freecourse

 

I "should" have never been able to lose my weight. I grew up in the drive-thru and obesity races through my genes. If I wanted an excuse to fail I had all of them. But, what makes me unique? Why was I the special snowflake that lost her 100lbs and kept it off? How was someone like me able to not only lose the weight but teach women? In this special episode I go into why I think I'm different and how it not any different than you.
